Navigation tabs

Navigate though the main sections of your publication by adding tabs.

How to enable tabs

  1. Uncomment Bookstrap.Section.css in index.html
  2. Uncomment Bookstrap.SectionTab plugin in index.html
  3. Uncomment the HTML <nav class="book-section-tabs" /> in index.html

  4. Update nav.html, so each link has a "data-section" attribute.

    Eg.

    <li><a href="page1.html" data-section="0">Page 1</a></li>

    Section number relates to the index number of the section link in "nav.book-section-tabs".
